entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is introduced as a visitor who has arrived at the Dunderbore's residence. He is accompanied by Albus Dumbledore.

entities.name: tom riddle
entities.description: Tom Riddle, an eleven-year-old boy, is introduced as the son of Merope Gaunt and Tom Riddle Sr. He is described as handsome and pale.

entities.name: albus dumbledore
entities.description: Albus Dumbledore is introduced as a visitor who has arrived at the Dunderbore's residence, accompanied by Harry Potter. He is described as having an eccentric appearance.

entities.name: merope gaunt
entities.description: Merope Gaunt is mentioned as Tom Riddle's mother who had a dying wish that her son would resemble his handsome father.

relationships.description: Harry Potter and Albus Dumbledore arrive at the Dunderbore's residence together.
Tom Riddle is mentioned as the son of Merope Gaunt, indicating a parent-child relationship between them.
